name: Starblast: Retro Wars (Starblast Finale)
description: Stablast: Retro Wars is a twin-stick arcade shooter where almost everything has no defined color.  Dash around in 6 gamemodes, each one with different rules and ways to play the game. Want a 5 minute game to play around in? Try Deadline! Want to play the game with the typical 'score X to get an extra life' rule? Try Mortality!
